price: 89 Allah leur a préparé des jardins traversés de rivières où ils demeureront pour l’éternité. Voilà le bonheur suprême.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
